Description: ESP LTD M-255 Electric Guitar An excellent ESP/LTD electric guitar!!! It has a beautiful Metallic Black Cherry finish, a 24 fret fully bound rosewood fretboard with gorgeous Pearl reverse Arrowhead inlays, reverse headstock, black hardware, and a recessed low profile Floyd Rose lic. locking tremolo(including the whammy bar. It has 2 Seymour Duncan Designed humbucker pickups that sound great! It is 25.5 scale, the neck width at the nut is 1 & 11/16", and it weighs about 8.4 pounds. The condition is excellent(a 9.2 out of 10) with only signs of use and shows just slight fret wear, the guitar is excellent all around with no problems except for a few lightbplaying scratches and a touched up paint chip next to the output jack(See pics). This one plays incredibly well! I am very impressed with the playability of this axe! Serial#E02548*, made in Korea in 2002 I think, includes the Fender gig bag case. 　 USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states.
